name: ExtenderX
author: WPXERO

sections.description: ExtenderX is a versatile WordPress plugin that enhances your site with powerful features like the Tilt Effect and Responsive Visibility Control. It supports all core blocks and integrates seamlessly with third-party blocks, providing flexibility for any block-based site. With more innovative features on the horizon, ExtenderX is designed to elevate both visual and functional aspects of your WordPress experience.
sections.installation:
1. Upload & Install: Upload the extenderx folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install it directly through the WordPress plugins screen.

  2. Activate: Go to the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress and activate ExtenderX.

  3. Get Started: Navigate to the Gutenberg editor and start using ExtenderX features with the block inserter.
sections.faq:
How do I use ExtenderX?

After installing and activating the plugin, go to the Gutenberg editor, search for ExtenderX features in the block inserter, and start using them.

Does it support all blocks?

Yes, ExtenderX fully supports all core blocks and third-party blocks, ensuring compatibility and smooth functionality across different block types.

Is ExtenderX compatible with other plugins/themes?

Yes, ExtenderX is designed to work seamlessly with other plugins and themes, ensuring a conflict-free experience.

short_description: ExtenderX adds Tilt Effect and Responsive Visibility Control to all core and third-party blocks!
description: ExtenderX is a versatile WordPress plugin that enhances your site with powerful features like the Tilt Effect and Responsive Visibility Control. It supports all core blocks and integrates seamlessly with third-party blocks, providing flexibility for any block-based site. With more innovative features on the horizon, ExtenderX is designed to elevate both visual and functional aspects of your WordPress experience.
